In England, in the seven days to 16 September, there were 144,531 new confirmed cases (255.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 September, there were 182,530 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (37,999 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 September is 6,398,633 (11,315 cases per 100,000 population).
